items.name: Phase I - Prototyping Noun-Computer
items.description: Noun-Computer prototype, stand with ports, and firmware development

items.name: Phase II - Prototyping Noun-Breadbook
items.description: Noun-Breadbook prototype development and manufacturing methods

items.name: Phase III - Manufacturing
items.description: Mass production of Noun-Computer and Noun-Breadbook

items.name: Phase IV - Proliferation

items.name: May~Aug 2023
items.description: Manufacture and test first 100 Noun-Computer prototypes

items.name: Sep 2023
items.description: Sponsor ETH global hackathon NY by providing Noun-Computers for hardware competitions

items.name: Jan 2024
items.description: Showcase Noun-Computers and Noun-Breadbook at CES and MWC, two of the most prestigious consumer electronics shows

description: I propose to grow a community of software and hardware developers around Noun-Computers and Noun-Breadbook (aka breadboard). The Noun-Devices will be available in the $40-$60 price range and distributed strictly using a fixed price policy to ensure that the end users do not overpay. NounsDAO can sponsor ETH Hackathons by providing the first 400 Noun-Computer kits. Also, 30% of the supply will be allocated to Nouns-Computer Fund any nouner will be able to request computers for Public Good via an on-chain proposal and send it to developing countries, minority groups, or other purposes.
title: Introducing Noun Computers
